attributes.action: Introduce a Electrical Power Consumption Labelling Scheme for all Electrical Products in the Home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the successful introduction of the traffic light Food Labelling scheme we the undersigned aks the Prime Minister to support the introduction of a similar scheme for Electrical Power consumption on all Consumer Electrical Goods sold in the EU.

This scheme should establish good performance benchmarks across all Electronics categories and clearly state the following performance

a) The power usage per hour for the product
b) The power usage per hour of the product in standby mode
c) The Carbon Footprint of the Product in both instances.

In addition all electricity boards should be obliged to publish a simple and consistent cost per Unit and the Carbon Footprint per Unit used.

From these 2 initiatives all customers will be able to work out the cost of all products and the relative performance in each category on both their pockets and the environment.
